title: jaya jaya srI raguraamaa
sahitya:
jaya jaya shrI raghurAmA sajjana hrdayArNava sOma



caraNam 1



sammatamuna nA mEnu nI sommani vEDukonnAnu



caraNam 2



gatihInuDai alasi vacciti nIve gAvalasi



caraNam 3



anyula nE kOritina rAjanya ninnu dUritinA



caraNam 4



ninnE nAmadi kOra rAma nannala incuTa mEra



caraNam 5



nanu maravaku shubhakaramA nInnanusarinca nA taramA



caraNam 6



mAkika evvaru lEru jUDa nIkika nyAyamu gAdu



caraNam 7



Adarincanu parAkA I khEdamu lika nendAka



caraNam 8



viparItamu lencitinO E aparAdhamu jEsitinO



caraNam 9



vAsi lEdanucu calamO nE jEsina pUjAphalamO



caraNam 10



nI sari vElpula lEru rAma-nA sari dInulu lEru



caraNam 11



telupanu evvaru lEdA nA kalavaramulu vina rAdA



caraNam 12



pAdamulaku vandanamu nA mIda nEla daNDanamu



caraNam 13



tALa jAla I raTTu rAma jAlamEla ceyibaTTu



caraNam 14



naravaru lI dharalOna nI karuNa lEdanaga valenA



caraNam 15



neramencuTaku pOka sarivArala navvaga nIka



caraNam 16



 MAnamu nIdE summi abhimAnamu nElukomm 



caraNam 17



pAdamulE gatiyaNTi kali bAdha taramu gAdaNTi



caraNam 18



cakkani nI rUpamunu gani sokkiti nA hrdayamuna



caraNam 19



kaTa kaTa pAvana nAma manasitu tirugani shrI rAma



caraNam 20



Asincina nApaini nI kAshu ninNDa dayarAni



caraNam 21



nA bhAgyamu nIDEra padmanAbha amara parivAra



caraNam 22



cAlu cAlu raghuvIra nannElu kOra manasAra



caraNam 23



rAjita navamaNi bhUSa tyAgarAja vinuta mrdubhASa
